extendedInfo.description: Chibi Me is an avatar creator which lets you create beautiful and cute looking anime characters.â Make the cutest looking avatarsâ Save it in your photo libraryâ Share it on Facebook & make it your profile pictureâ High quality imagesâ Use it as an avatar anywhere you wantâ Over THOUSANDS of different chibi looks!â Keeps you busy for a long timeYou can also purchase in-app EXTENSION PACKs to create even more beautiful looking anime characters with additional exclusive items for the price of a pack of candy. Only these are sweeter than a candy and they won't make you fat =^.^=\(Ëâ£Ë)/Did you already write a review?We are sharing the coolest reviews on our Facebook page and Twitter!www.facebook.com/ChibiMeApphttps://twitter.com/chibimeapp

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: i love this app it is cool and try itfor yourself see if you like it i love it then when you are done you can post it on instagram or facebook. :)
reviews.author: Raegyn Dixon

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I love this super cute game! It\'s great for all my female characters, and even making self portraits.
reviews.author: Ellie Turner

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: It\'s good and you can make some cute pictures but if you have them hold something...it looks fine in the preview...but once you save it and look at the copy in your phones gallery, the hand is on their face. Please fix it.
reviews.author: Arion Sams

reviews.title: This ia good!
reviews.comment: I lile this app i just wish that it would show the rest of the body because it only shows the face nd a hand!:( Other than that,this app is cool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need more varieties
reviews.comment: I think there is no black hair. Please try doing more hairstyles. And also the eyes, try doing brown and hazel. And please make them pretty. I am not asking for all of these selfish needs for myself but on behalf of other users who want to make replicas of their friends and family or themselves but can\'t. I hope you understand cause I really love this app!
reviews.author: Chiko Luke

reviews.title: Fun! But...
reviews.comment: Fun but please make it   movable to SD card! The game also does not fit in my screen..When i save the picture, the hand goes to the side of the page. Fix all these problems and i\'ll rate it 5 stars!Please!! Thanks!
reviews.author: Airica Cheah

reviews.title: Update cause Android Version doesn\'t have the same thing as Iphone
reviews.comment: Please update it I email u already thx. I will rate 5 star when updated with same stuff as iphone
reviews.author: Tina Nguyen

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: This is a really cool, fun and engaging game. One small change would be an \'add to instagram\' button. That would make it incredible! It really takes up loads of time (in a good way) and I really love it!
reviews.author: Ruby Lynch

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: But you need to put more hair styles on there and all of that and I\'ll give you 5 stars until sorry but your on 3 until ya fix it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE
reviews.comment: Its a cute simple game that I love! Worth downloading it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but. . .
reviews.comment: It`s good and i love this but to make boys chibi i need to pay first .\343\205\241. c`mon make it free !

reviews.title: Luv except i wish i got the eye package which never showed up
reviews.comment: I love it but the only thing is that i bought the eye package but i never got it it just said error
reviews.author: Brooke Morlock

reviews.title: This app sucks
reviews.comment: Sucks I deleted all my apps and it still won\'t let me download it
reviews.author: Savannah Brewer

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Only complaint is buying new things for the character. There are separate packs that contain different accesaries but all of them are the same price and a little pricey for a game like this. Also it takes a lot of patience to download on a virgin mobile kyocera phone.  Otherwise its a great cute little game! Keep improving!!
reviews.author: Madisyn Wright

reviews.title: ILI
reviews.comment: I love it so much every time I play it :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-)  I give you a 5 star
reviews.author: lpskhail1334

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: It is so awesome it is like im in a movie
reviews.author: Adghtc Hitchhiking

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love the gameplay a lot. However ever since I changed to my new phone I have been experiencing difficulties accessing my purchases in the game even though google play already recognises the previous purchase. Please help me.
reviews.author: Kimberly Quah

reviews.title: For Tablets
reviews.comment: Uhh, it\'s cool and all but, on my tablet, the hands and few stuff are jumbled up and it doesn\'t fit properly. Please fix, anyways, beautiful app. =)~
reviews.author: Jan Rishael Moronia

reviews.title: Good but problem -.-\"
reviews.comment: Problem: whenever I save a pic, the hand ends up covering the mouth.>:/ If u fix this problem, I\'ll give u 5 stars *-*

reviews.title: I really love it
reviews.comment: Its awesome and cute
